title: High-order Tensor Pooling with Attention for Action Recognition. (arXiv:2110.05216v2 [cs.CV] UPDATED)
abstract: We aim at capturing high-order statistics of feature vectors formed by a neural network, and propose end-to-end second- and higher-order pooling to form a tensor descriptor. Tensor descriptors require a robust similarity measure due to low numbers of aggregated vectors and the burstiness phenomenon, when a given feature appears more/less frequently than statistically expected. The Heat Diffusion Process (HDP) on a graph Laplacian is closely related to the Eigenvalue Power Normalization (EPN) of the covariance/auto-correlation matrix, whose inverse forms a loopy graph Laplacian. We show that the HDP and the EPN play the same role, i.e., to boost or dampen the magnitude of the eigenspectrum thus preventing the burstiness. We equip higher-order tensors with EPN which acts as a spectral detector of higher-order occurrences to prevent burstiness. We also prove that for a tensor of order r built from d dimensional feature descriptors, such a detector gives the likelihood if at least one high

translated_title: 利用注意机制的高阶张量池化在动作识别中的应用
translated_abstract: 本论文提出了一种利用注意机制进行高阶张量池化的方法，旨在捕捉神经网络生成的特征向量的高阶统计信息，形成张量描述符。张量描述符要求具备鲁棒的相似性度量，以应对聚合向量数量较少和爆发现象，即某些特征出现的频率高于或低于统计预期的情况。我们将图拉普拉斯矩阵上的热扩散过程与协方差/自相关矩阵的特征值幂归一化（EPN）密切相关，其逆形成了一个环状图拉普拉斯矩阵。我们证明了热扩散过程与EPN具有相同的作用，即增强或减弱特征值谱的幅度，从而防止爆发现象。我们将高阶张量配备了EPN，它可以作为高阶出现的谱检测器，以防止爆发现象。我们还证明，对于一个由d维特征描述符构建的阶数为r的张量，这样的检测器可以给出至少存在一个高阶出现的可能性。
tldr: 本论文提出了一种利用注意机制进行高阶张量池化的方法，通过引入特征值幂归一化（EPN）来防止爆发现象并提高动作识别的准确性。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a method for high-order tensor pooling with attention, which improves action recognition accuracy by preventing burstiness using eigenvalue power normalization (EPN).
